name: azure_boards_mcp
description: API para interagir com o Azure Boards e obter informações sobre tarefas do projeto.

functions.name: getTasks
functions.description: Returns a hierarchical list of all active tasks, grouped by Epic and User Story.

functions.name: getTaskDescription
functions.description: Returns the details and description of a specific task.

functions.name: getChildTasks
functions.description: Returns a list of child tasks for a given parent task.

parameters.name: parentId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent task.

functions.name: countAllTasks
functions.description: Returns the total count of all tasks ever created in the project.

functions.name: getTasksByType
functions.description: Returns a list of tasks of a specific type. The possible types are 'Epic', 'User Story' and 'Task'.

parameters.name: taskType
parameters.description: The type of the task. Can be 'Epic', 'User Story' or 'Task'.

functions.name: get_page
functions.description: Retrieve a specific Confluence page by its ID.

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the Confluence page.

functions.name: search_confluence
functions.description: Search Confluence content using CQL (Confluence Query Language).

parameters.name: cql
parameters.description: CQL search query (e.g., 'type=page AND space=DEMO AND text ~ "search term"').

functions.name: create_page
functions.description: Creates a new Confluence page. Content must be in Confluence Storage Format (XML-based).

parameters.name: spaceKey
parameters.description: The key of the space where the page will be created.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of the new page.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Page content in Confluence Storage Format (XML-based).

functions.name: update_page
functions.description: Updates an existing Confluence page. Content must be in Confluence Storage Format (XML-based).

parameters.name: pageId
parameters.description: The ID of the page to update.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The new title for the page.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: New page content in Confluence Storage Format (XML-based).
